column4: Lonewulf: Thanks for the link but alas it's not for 12.10. I had no problems with the drivers on 12.04 by the way
I feel 12.10 is really laggy, taking seconds to open a window and all while on 12.04 it was straight.
I am currently running 12.10 but everything is so slow
I haven't done anything yet after the third reinstall
in 12.04 64 bits it was all fine as well
Same for me in 12.04 I am talking about 12.10 Lone :-)
top tells you what process uses how much CPU, memory etc.
so you might find out where the entropy goes ....
well, try to sort top either by CPU or mem, and you'll see
Sure. But your issue seems to be with the graphics....
